entry.source: This is a job from B's pharmacy.{F801}There is a certain type of moss that grows{F801}within Naraku. We've recently discovered that{F801}it has analeptic effects. B would like you to{F801}find {F804,5}{F878,1}{F804,0} {F804,5}{F872,1}{F804,0}es.{F801}Whoever delivers them first gets the product.{F801}
